channel.title: Pheatmap on Badran Elshenawy
channel.description: Recent content in Pheatmap on Badran Elshenawy

item.title: Mastering Bulk RNA-seq Analysis – Post 12: QC Heatmaps for Sample Quality!
item.description: Dive deep into sample quality control with correlation and distance heatmaps that reveal precise sample relationships. Learn to spot sample mix-ups, batch effects, and technical problems before they compromise your RNA-seq analysis.

item.title: Mastering Bulk RNA-seq Analysis – Post 10: Heatmap Tools Battle!
item.description: Navigate the choice between pheatmap, ComplexHeatmap, and tidyHeatmap with practical guidance. Discover which package fits your workflow, experience level, and visualization goals through real-world examples and decision frameworks.

item.title: Mastering Bulk RNA-seq Analysis – Post 9: The Power of Heatmaps!
item.description: Master heatmaps as the perfect complement to volcano plots for RNA-seq analysis. Explore how these pattern-recognition powerhouses reveal gene modules, validate sample quality, and transform lists of significant genes into coherent biological narratives.
